column4: Thinking about uninstalling both nvidia and nvidia-glx to see what happens
can't believe there isn't a history in update-manager
Found someone else with the same problem
rootil: does the nvidia kernel revision number match the nvidiaglx revision number
gonna have a look
dunno i dont think that the versions are matching: 20051028 is the kernel and 2.6.17.6-1 is the glx
but there are no updates
: try running glxgears
glxgears ? sry i am very new to ubunto where do i find this ?
just type it into  a terminal
uh yeah i see a result
is it an error
no that are the gears :D
but they are running deathly slow
if i see the gears. what does it mean ? does it mean the drivers do work? but why are them that slow
rootil: it means you are not having the same problem that I am. lol
hehe thats funny, but the drivers still are not working lol
rootil: have you edited the xorg file
i dindt edit a thing, the only steps i did is installing nvidia-glx and nvidia-glx-config enable and got an error
should i do it ?
